availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Swope (Greenup County, KY, moulder and farmer)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, moulder and farmer. New York native. Married to Susan Wurts Swap in Lawrence County, Ohio, on February 28, 1841. Father of Martha A. Swap, William Swap, Samuel Swap, Josephine Swap, Virginia Swap, and George Swap. Moulder in Montgomery County in 1850. Farmer in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Dayton, Ward 5, p. 244A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, East Little Sandy, p. 848.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Lawrence County, Hamilton, p. 328B.
Lawrence Probate Court. Marriage Records and Index, 1817-1843, vol 1-3. Lawrence County Courthouse, Ironton, Ohio. Film #004922497 p. 344, p. 213 of 529.
_Find A Grave, "George Swap (1812-1891)," Memorial #95938475, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/95938475 (accessed June 8, 2021).
